CustomField.description: Created for additional change to display others for lwc BIZ-50270
CustomField.formula: MAX(IF(TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 30',0, IF(TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 45' && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c > 10000),1, IF((TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 45'|| TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 60' || TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 90') && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c < 10000),1, IF(TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 60' || TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 90',2, IF(TEXT(Renewal_Payment_Terms__c) = 'Net 120',8, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Custom_Software_Payment_Term__c)),11,0) ))) )),IF((Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 30',0, IF((Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 45' && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c > 10000),1, IF(((Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 45'|| (Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 60' || (Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 90') && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c < 10000),1, IF((Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 60' || (Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 90',2, IF((Payment_Term_Software__c) = 'Net 120',8, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Custom_Software_Payment_Term__c)),11,0) ))) )))
CustomField.label: Payment term level(exception)
